pullRequest.title: [BP] Only create metadata data folder when needed
pullRequest.bodyText:
GeoNetwork type harvester create the metadata directory structure in GeoNetwork data directory
even if the remote metadata doesn't have public or private folders. This can make the
filesystem run out of inodes with very large catalogues.
This commit only creates the directory tree structure for the metadata record if the imported
metadata has public or private files.
Since 3.10.x versions this is already done by FilesystemStore:
https://github.com/geonetwork/core-geonetwork/blob/3.10.x/core/src/main/java/org/fao/geonet/api/records/attachments/FilesystemStore.java#L229
Backport of #4437.

[BP] Only create metadata data folder when needed

GeoNetwork type harvester create the metadata directory structure in GeoNetwork data directory
even if the remote metadata doesn't have public or private folders. This can make the
filesystem run out of inodes with very large catalogues.

This commit only creates the directory tree structure for the metadata record if the imported
metadata has public or private files.

Since 3.10.x versions this is already done by FilesystemStore:
 https://github.com/geonetwork/core-geonetwork/blob/3.10.x/core/src/main/java/org/fao/geonet/api/records/attachments/FilesystemStore.java#L229

Backport of #4437.
